plot: Mia, a Tongan-born girl raised in Australia, becomes lost in her western identity. She takes a serious but humorous journey to Tonga, to find the one thing missing most from her life - her culture.
title: My Lost Kainga
plot_es: Mia, a Tongan-born girl raised in Australia, becomes lost in her western identity. She takes a serious but humorous journey to Tonga, to find the one thing missing most from her life - her culture.
plot_en: Mia, a Tongan-born girl raised in Australia, becomes lost in her western identity. She takes a serious but humorous journey to Tonga, to find the one thing missing most from her life - her culture.
